last_episode_to_air.name: Gadget and the Red Rose
last_episode_to_air.overview: Dr. Claw brings gangster Spuds Malone out of retirement to eliminate Gadget with his infamous potato-firing tommy gun "Red Rose".

name: Inspector Gadget
overview: Inspector Gadget is a clumsy, dim-witted human cyborg detective with various bionic gadgets built into his body. Gadget stumbles around working the cases while his niece and dog do most of the investigating. Gadget's arch-nemesis is Dr. Claw, the leader of an evil organisation, known as "M.A.D."

episodes.name: Winter Olympics
episodes.overview: Gadget goes to the Winterland Resort where the world's athletes are gathered for the opening of the Olympic games. Dr.Claw tries to ruin the Olympics by replacing the torch bearer with a M.A.D. Agent and replacing the torch with dynamite.

episodes.name: Monster Lake
episodes.overview: Gadget looks for a missing scientist who vanished at a lake rumored to harbor a monster.

episodes.name: Down on the Farm
episodes.overview: M.A.D. tries to do Gadget in by locking him in a missile hidden in a farm's grain silo.

episodes.name: Gadget at the Circus
episodes.overview: Gadget brings Penny to the circus as he investigates a top-secret mission. The Inspector believes that Dr. Claw has replaced some of the circus performers with M.A.D. Agents! Gadget goes undercover as a clown to uncover the truth.

episodes.name: The Amazon
episodes.overview: Dr. Claw kidnaps Professor Von Slickstein, the brilliant scientist who invented all of Gadget's gadgets, and takes him to the Amazon to build an army of Gadget-like robots.

episodes.name: Health Spa
episodes.overview: Dr. Claw tricks Gadget into attending a "vacation" at a M.A.D.-trapped health spa. Can Penny and Brain save him?

episodes.name: The Boat
episodes.overview: Gadget is assigned to board a cruise ship and safeguard the passenger's priceless jewelry from Dr. Claw's clutches.

episodes.name: Haunted Castle
episodes.overview: While searching for a crime-fighters' convention in Transylvania Gadget arrives at a castle that Dr. Claw has booby-trapped to kill him.

episodes.name: Race to the Finish
episodes.overview: Gadget enters the Gadget Mobile in a race and finds that Dr. Claw has also entered with a plot to eliminate him and his competition by sabotaging the other race cars.

episodes.name: The Ruby
episodes.overview: Gadget is sent to India to investigate a missing ruby, which has been stolen by M.A.D. to be used as an amplifying power source for a laser beam that will destroy an advanced satellite in space.

episodes.name: A Star is Lost
episodes.overview: Gadget has to guard the life of famed rock singer Rick Rocker, whom M.A.D. has sinister plans for. But Gadget winds up replacing Rocker as the current reigning King of Rock!

episodes.name: All That Glitters
episodes.overview: Gadget is assigned to find El Dorado, the fabled Lost City of Gold, before Dr. Claw's agents find it and tear it apart to melt down the gold.

episodes.name: Movie Set
episodes.overview: Gadget falls for actress Lana Lamour unaware that she's a M.A.D. agent and that her movie is M.A.D.'s cover for filming top secret facilities.

episodes.name: Amusement Park
episodes.overview: Gadget has to find the bomb Dr. Claw has hidden in Metro City's amusement park.

episodes.name: Art Heist
episodes.overview: Gadget has to stop M.A.D. from looting the New York Museum of Art.

episodes.name: Volcano Island
episodes.overview: A prophet working for M.A.D. predicts doom for an island resort and plans to use his "pineapple bombs" to trigger the island's volcano to ensure his prediction comes true.

episodes.name: The Invasion
episodes.overview: M.A.D. agents disguised as Martians terrorize Metro City.

episodes.name: The Infiltration
episodes.overview: Presto Chango, the world's greatest disguise artist and a M.A.D. agent, plans to infiltrate an Interpol conference in London disguised as Inspector Gadget.

episodes.name: The Curse of the Pharoah
episodes.overview: M.A.D. agents disguised as mummies and ancient Egyptian gods try to loot the tomb of a newly discovered pharoah.

episodes.name: M.A.D. Trap
episodes.overview: M.A.D. agent Rat begins committing crimes in an easy to predict pattern to lure Inspector Gadget into a steel foundry that has been turned in a deathtrap.

episodes.name: Basic Training
episodes.overview: Gadget must protect a trainload of important computer parts from M.A.D. hijackers.

episodes.name: Sleeping Gas
episodes.overview: Gadget is assigned to halt a diabolical M.A.D. scheme: put entire cities to sleep with a powerful sleeping gas.

episodes.name: Gadget's Replacement
episodes.overview: A new supercomputer has made the Metro City police so efficient that Chief Quimby fires Gadget but M.A.D. has a plan to control the computer and feed the police false information.

episodes.name: Greenfinger
episodes.overview: Gadget is assigned to protect Professor Greenfinger who has developed a super plant growth formula, but Greenfinger has already been replaced by a M.A.D. agent.

episodes.name: Gadget Goes West
episodes.overview: Inspector Gadget arrives at a western tourist town that plays heavily on its cowboy image to stop modern day outlaw Black Bart.

episodes.name: Launch Time
episodes.overview: M.A.D. tries to sabotage a NASA mission.

episodes.name: Photo Safari
episodes.overview: Inspector Gadget must stop Dr. Claw from using animals to scare villagers away.

episodes.name: Coo Coo Clock Caper
episodes.overview: While Gadget is searching Switzerland for stolen gold, Penny runs afoul of the murderous M.A.D. Agent, The Clockmaker.

episodes.name: The Bermuda Triangle
episodes.overview: Ships are vanishing in the Bermuda Triangle, but the seemingly supernatural aspects of the disappearances are subterfuge by Dr. Claw, who is using an enormous machine to swallow oil tankers and ransack them.

episodes.name: The Japanese Connection
episodes.overview: Penny won a computer contest and is in Japan helping her local counterpart, Atsuko, to foil an alliance between Dr. Claw and his Japanese counterpart, Iji Waruda-san.

episodes.name: Arabian Nights
episodes.overview: Gadget is sent to the wealthy Middle-Eastern kingdom of Yetzanistan to safeguard a sacred sword.

episodes.name: Clear Case
episodes.overview: South African diamond miners are terrorized by a ghost who is actually a M.A.D. scientist using diamond dust to create invisibility suits.

episodes.name: Dutch Treat
episodes.overview: Inspector Gadget hunts for diamond smugglers in the land of tulips and chocolate.

episodes.name: The Great Divide
episodes.overview: Gadget visits the Balkans to stop a war between a tribe of super-strong men and super-strong women while Dr. Claw tries to steal the potion that gives them their uncanny strength.

episodes.name: Eye of the Dragon
episodes.overview: Gadget is sent to Hong Kong to recover the priceless jewel the Eye of the Dragon and foil an alliance between Dr. Claw and Hong Kong's crime-lord Mr. Chow.

episodes.name: Doubled Agent
episodes.overview: M.A.D. engineers an android replica of Inspector Gadget that is used to steal from Metro City's banks in order to have the real Gadget framed for armed-robbery. With our hero wrongfully incarcerated, Dr. Claw sets his sights on kidnapping the Shah of Freeland and demanding a hefty ransom for his release.

episodes.name: Plantform of the Opera
episodes.overview: M.A.D. agents use an opera house as cover to tunnel into a bank vault while protected by a killer man-eating plant.

episodes.name: Don't Hold Your Breath
episodes.overview: Inspector Gadget is assigned to look into a case of some missing oceanographers who were searching for an undersea city when they disappeared.

episodes.name: Gone Went the Wind
episodes.overview: A M.A.D. scientist at the North Pole creates a machine to cause windstorms all over the globe.

episodes.name: King Wrong
episodes.overview: In the far-off country of Pianostan, the people remain happy as long as their King is miserable. But M.A.D. has been ensuring that the King is happy in order to disrupt the peace, so Inspector Gadget is sent out to investigate. To further complicate matters, the King looks exactly like the Inspector!

episodes.name: Pirate Island
episodes.overview: Inspector Gadget, Penny, and Brain are on vacation in the Caribbean. But before they've had a chance to get any serious R & R on Gadget's dilapidated old rust-bucket of a boat, duty calls and Inspector Gadget is back to work.

episodes.name: M.A.D. Acadamy
episodes.overview: Gadget is assigned to find and shut down M.A.D.'s training center for its agents and Dr. Claw decides eliminating Gadget will make a good class project for the latest batch of recruits.

episodes.name: No Flies on Us
episodes.overview: In Malaysia, the Wild Man of Borneo (a M.A.D. scientist), has both derived a virus from flies and concocted its antidote. A head-cold-suffering Gadget must stop Dr. Claw's plan to turn everyone on the planet into babbling, bubble-blowing imbeciles.

episodes.name: Luck of the Irish
episodes.overview: Gadget heads to Ireland to locate the Blarney Stone, "The national treasure of Ireland," when it's stolen by M.A.D. agents. While plotting to use a laser cannon to slice up the Stone and smuggle it out of the country, Dr. Claw dispatches the quarrelsome O'Shea Brothers to eliminate Gadget.

episodes.name: Prince of the Gypsies
episodes.overview: Dr. Claw tries to frame the gypsies of Freedonia for the theft of the Royal Coat of Arms. So Gadget investigates the gypsies while Penny and her new friend, Anya, try to find the real thief.

episodes.name: Old Man of the Mountain
episodes.overview: M.A.D. has abducted a prominent seismologist, who is coerced by Dr. Claw to construct a machine capable of generating deadly earthquakes upon the world.  Gadget's case takes him deep within the Rocky Mountains, where his misadventures are compounded by a M.A.D. ranger agent and a grizzled, gold-crazed prospector.

episodes.name: The Emerald Duck
episodes.overview: Gadget heads for Mexico, where he must stop "The oldest Mayan artifact known to exist," the Emerald Duck, from falling into the hands of a M.A.D. agent -- a Mexican bandit named Macho Miguel. The Emerald Duck is the key to activating a powerful and ancient weapon.

episodes.name: Do Unto Udders
episodes.overview: M.A.D. utilizes satellite waves to cause local cows to stop producing milk, forcing consumers to purchase milk from "New Foods Dairy" (a M.A.D. front).

episodes.name: Did You Myth Me?
episodes.overview: A M.A.D. scientist tries to steal an ancient Greek scroll said to hold the secret of turning lead into gold.

episodes.name: A Bad Altitude
episodes.overview: Dr. Claw intends to sink most of an island so that his (currently) mountaintop resort will become the only hotel on "M.A.D. Island".

episodes.name: Funny Money
episodes.overview: M.A.D. has enlisted the aid of the incarcerated Funny Money counterfeiting gang in a plot to generate millions upon millions of bogus dollars for Dr. Claw to use in his dirty work. Two of the gang's three members manage to escape from prison in order to set up shop, while the last and most talented member, a visually-challenged man named Squint, must be up to the arduous task of bumping off Gadget when he comes to the jail to investigate the break-out.

episodes.name: Follow That Jet
episodes.overview: Dr. Claw begins making US Airforce jets disappear so that he can create his own private M.A.D. airforce.

episodes.name: Dry Spell
episodes.overview: A M.A.D. agent and his Blue Trolls causes a drought in Metro City by cutting off the city's mountain water resources.

episodes.name: Smeldorado
episodes.overview: Dr. Claw creates a ray that turns gold into smelly cheese, planning to change it back once the government empties Fort Knox of the foul smelling stuff.

episodes.name: Quimby Exchange
episodes.overview: Gadget is assigned to protect "Nervous Nick" Defecto, a former M.A.D. agent, from Dr. Claw's wrath. In revenge, Dr. Claw takes Chief Quimby hostage and offers him in exchange for his wayward agent.

episodes.name: Weather In Tibet
episodes.overview: Penny teams up with a Tibetan boy to destroy a M.A.D. weather control machine while her uncle blunders around as usual.

episodes.name: Unhenged
episodes.overview: Gadget must put a stop to M.A.D.'s latest plot for global domination, which involves the kidnapping of the world's leading solar scientists and coercing them to design and construct a solar-powered heat cannon at the grounds of mysterious Stonehenge.

episodes.name: Snakin' All Over
episodes.overview: A M.A.D. agent intends to use his pet snakes to steal a valuable coin collection.

episodes.name: In Seine
episodes.overview: In Paris a M.A.D. agent uses a robot to rob the rich and famous.

episodes.name: Tree Guesses
episodes.overview: Dr. Claw has concocted a chemical compound that decomposes wood at an accelerated rate, which he threatens to unleash upon the world's forests in exchange for a hefty ransom.

episodes.name: Birds of a Feather
episodes.overview: In Turkey a M.A.D. agent uses his birds to steal a very valuable gemstone from an exhibition.

episodes.name: So it is Written
episodes.overview: Gadget arrives in an Arabian country where he is believed to be the prophesied one who will find a long lost treasure cave. Dr. Claw is eager to let his old enemy lead him to the treasure before eliminating him.

episodes.name: Fang the Wonder Dog
episodes.overview: Dr. Claw tries to abduct movie star "Fang the Wonder Dog" from the set of his latest film so he can ransom him.

episodes.name: School for Pickpockets
episodes.overview: Gadget must foil Dr. Claw's plans to steal his new Gadget watch, and close down the school for pickpockets.

episodes.name: Quizz Master
episodes.overview: A slick game show host mesmerizes contestants when they enter his TV program's sealed "21"-like booth, which is outfitted with hypnotic lights. The contestants are then commanded to rob banks and turn over the stolen loot to Dr. Claw. Gadget investigates, but becomes another victim of the hypnosis.

episodes.name: Magic Gadget
episodes.overview: The Great Wambini, famed magician and M.A.D. agent, gives a performance Metro City will never forget -- with the demise of Inspector Gadget as the planned finale.

episodes.name: The Great Wambini's Seance
episodes.overview: All the pets in Metro City are being kidnapped, and M.A.D. is the likely suspect. Could the Great Wambini be the key to the case?

episodes.name: Wambini Predicts
episodes.overview: The Great Wambini goes to Alpakistan to win the King's diamond-spitting llama by making three accurate predictions. Gadget is sent along to investigate M.A.D. involvement, and ends up playing in the National Floobyball Tournament.

episodes.name: The Capeman Cometh
episodes.overview: Corporal Capeman joins Inspector Gadget posing as his assistant while Gadget pursues the notorious ninja.

episodes.name: Crashcourse in Crime
episodes.overview: While Gadget trains his new assistant Capeman, Dr. Claw launches a crime spree to celebrate M.A.D.'s anniversary.

episodes.name: Gadget's Gadgets
episodes.overview: Inspector Gadget and Capeman are both sent to a clinic run by M.A.D. They tell Gadget that they are going to test his gadgets, but in reality they plan to destroy them.

episodes.name: Gadget in Minimadness
episodes.overview: Professor Dumkopf of M.A.D. unleashes the Linguinis, five little imp-like creatures, on Inspector Gadget's house with the mission of deep-sixing the Inspector.

episodes.name: The Incredible Shrinking Gadget
episodes.overview: Professor Dumkopf of M.A.D. is back, this time with a shrink-ray gun he uses repeatedly on Inspector Gadget in an attempt to shrink him into nothingness.

episodes.name: Gadget Meets the Grappler
episodes.overview: The Gadget clan faces one last threat from M.A.D.'s Dr. Dumbkopf, which involves battling his hulking, irascible humanoid assistant named the Grappler.  Fortunately, sweets, candies, and ultimately Penny's kindness help in soothing the soul of this misunderstood beast and thwarting Dr. Dumbkopf for the last time.

episodes.name: Bad Dreams are Made of This
episodes.overview: Something ominous is inexplicably causing the citizens of Metro City to be beset by unstoppable nightmares.pennys,nightmare,is,that,her,computerbook,falls,in,to,the,hands,of.mad

episodes.name: Ghost Catchers
episodes.overview: Dr. Spectrum of M.A.D. invents "Ghost Globules" -- pellets that produce glowing ghostly critters. He plans to sets them loose on Metro City, then offer to sell people a spray that will banish them. Inspector Gadget investigates a costume party while on the trail.

episodes.name: Busy Signal
episodes.overview: Under the guise of a local telephone company, M.A.D. inventor Dr. Spectrum and his goons systemically target the mansions of Metro City's elite neighborhoods and proceed to burglarize them with the dial of a number and with a zap of a teleportation gun to send the loot straight into Claw's hands.penny,is,caguht,and,odered,to,be,sent,to,doctor,claw

episodes.name: Focus on Gadget
episodes.overview: When a space station orbiting Earth goes silent, Gadget must investigate. Penny and Brain tag along aboard the space shuttle that takes Gadget to his destination, where Penny discovers that the station's soft-spoken HAL-like supercomputer is under the control of two M.A.D. agents, Dr. Null and Dr. Void.  Their evil plot involves a giant magnifying glass that can aim and intensify the sun's rays towards Earth.

episodes.name: Mad in the Moon
episodes.overview: Using bombs disguised as kewpie dolls, Dr. Claw and his agents, Null and Void, scheme to alter the surface of the moon so that it will resemble the M.A.D. logo.

episodes.name: N.S.F. Gadget
episodes.overview: M.A.D. gains control of Metro City's banks, by tapping into an orbiting satellite. With the added distraction of "Crazy Gas", a substance that induces hallucinations in their victims, can even Inspector Gadget ever hope to regain control of the city's bank accounts?

episodes.name: Tyrannosaurus Gadget
episodes.overview: A M.A.D. agent devises a plot to bring dinosaurs back into the 20th Century so Dr. Claw can crush Metro City, while at the same time killing Gadget's ancestors to ensure he never exists in the present.

episodes.name: Gadget's Roma
episodes.overview: Inspector Gadget, Penny, and Brain travel back in time again -- on this occasion, to ancient Rome to prevent Dr. Claw's own time traveler, Thelma Bodkin, from deciphering an ancient mosaic and stealing the treasure it describes.

episodes.name: Gadget's Clean Sweep
episodes.overview: M.A.D. agents travel back in time to 19th-century England to steal the crown jewels and wipe out Inspector Gadget's ancestors, chimney sweeps named Chimney and Char Gadget. Gadget is assigned to follow them back in time and stop them.

episodes.name: Gadget Meets the Clan
episodes.overview: Dr. Claw hires a retired mob boss, the wheelchair-bound Great Great Godfather, to assassinate Inspector Gadget.

episodes.name: Gadget and Old Lace
episodes.overview: Dr. Claw seeks the wise advice of his mentor in destroying Gadget and winds up with two Black Widows who believe assassinating Gadget would be their cup of tea.

episodes.name: Gadget and the Red Rose
episodes.overview: Dr. Claw brings gangster Spuds Malone out of retirement to eliminate Gadget with his infamous potato-firing tommy gun "Red Rose".
